comment.author: Miranda
comment.text: Yea... So would he. At least she pays taxes. Oh, and am I the only one that noticed he's endorsed her as President numerous times? Even their kids are friends. Quit being pawns... It's all a show.

replies.author: Justice
replies.text: I guess you were an Obama fan too! Did he ever give a birth certificate to prove he was a US citizen? NO!

replies.author: Miranda
replies.text: Justice actually... He did. Lol. Wow. Behind the times.

replies.author: Lexington
replies.text: So if you found a 100% legal way not to pay taxes, you wouldnt? I've never seen an angry post about other billionaires doing the EXACT same thing he has done.

replies.author: Miranda
replies.text: Not if the middle class had to pay for me to "legally not pay taxes"... Call me crazy, but I'd also pay the workers I hired.
